dmca.title: Urgent - Toledo Public Schools
dmca.body:
(419) 252-6253
RWolff@SpenglerNathanson.com

November 20, 2006

E-MAIL AND CERTIFIED MAIL
Mr. Chris Myers
1952 Talbot Street
Toledo, OH  43613

Re:        Internet Sites

Dear Mr. Myers:

        This office represents Toledo Public Schools.  The school
district has shared with us your websites at www.tpssearch.com and
www.ideasfortps.com.

        The first purpose of this letter is to demand that you
immediately cease and desist the use of the TPS logo (black background
with red, blue, green and yellow symbols) on the  tpssearch.com site.
This is a trademarked logo owned by TPS and cannot be used by anyone
without the authorization of TPS.  If you do not immediately remove the
logo from your website, TPS reserves the right to pursue you for
trademark infringement.

        In addition, while TPS recognizes your right to express your
opinions and solicit the opinions of others on your websites, TPS wishes
to assure that the public is not misled as to the source of both of your
websites.  Therefore, demand is hereby made that the home page of each
of your websites display the following disclaimer:

        "This website is not sanctioned by Toledo Public Schools, and
the opinions expressed herein are not the opinions of the Board of
Education or Administration of Toledo Public Schools".

        We will monitor your websites to assure your compliance with the
foregoing.

Very truly yours,

SPENGLER NATHANSON P.L.L.


Richard E. Wolff
REW\jac
cc:        John Foley, Interim Superintendent
        Toledo Public Schools
        Lisa E. Pizza, Esq.




Richard Wolff
Attorney at Law
Spengler Nathanson P.L.L.
608 Madison, Suite 1000
Toledo, Ohio 43604-1699

www.spenglernathanson.com

Phone: (419) 252-6253
Fax: (419) 241-8599
rwolff@spenglernathanson.com
